titleproper.value: Preliminary Inventory of the Joseph North Spanish Civil War Artifacts <num>ALBA.294</num>

publisher.value: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

addressline: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

creation.value: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace <date>2017-07-18T20:57:57</date>

corpname.value: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

unittitle.value: Joseph North Spanish Civil War Artifacts

p.value: Materials are open to researchers. Please contact the Tamiment Library & Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives for more information and to schedule an appointment, tamiment.wagner@nyu.edu or 212-998-2630.

Joseph North, a Communist Party activist and journalist,  visited Spain during the Civil War as a correspondent for the <emph render="italic">Daily Worker.</emph>The collection consists of a number of items that North brought back from Spain as souvenirs.
